title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. I, ch. IV, subch. B, pt. 437 - Municipal Park Projects

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. I, ch. IV, subch. B, pt. 437

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, §§
52-0901[4], 52- 0909[1][e]; Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation Law, §3.09[8]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
